Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Doctoral \Doc"tor*al\, a. [Cf. F. doctoral.] Of or relating to a doctor, or to the degree of doctor. [1913 Webster]
Doctoral habit and square cap. -- Wood. [1913 Webster]
doctoral adj : of or relating to a doctor or doctorate; "doctoral dissertation"; "doctorial candidates" [syn: {doctorial}]
